# `MultipleUploadProgressState`

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">isUploading</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

Returns `true` when the files are being uploaded.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">progress</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>null &#124; number</code>

Returns the overall progress of the upload, from 0 to 100. Returns null if the upload has not started yet.

---
